arv_uvsp_packet_debug ()

void
arv_uvsp_packet_debug (const ArvUvspPacket *packet,
                       ArvDebugLevel level);

Dumps the content of packet if level is lower or equal to the current debug level for the sp debug category. See arv_debug_enable().

Parameters

packet

a ArvUvspPacket

  

level

debug level
